page.title: 19LUTTERWORTH HIGH SCHOOL
page.content: Lutterworth High School is the only school in the town offering {Education to the 11 to 14 year olds. It is a Secondary School for boys and girls and was built in 1927. There are 836 pupils in the school this year, divided into 29 classes. There are 19 different school subjects taught. There are 45 teachers. Children become members of one of the four school HOUSES which are named after famous people from the Second World War - Montgomery (Blue), Tedder(Red), Cunningham(Yellow) and Churchill(Green). { The School Motto is "Life is {Service". } A survey of the school showed that the most popular subjects among the pupils were Design, Games and Physical Education.
